question: Theatre production of Peter Brooks’ “Mahabharata” features whom among the following?
explanation: Peter Brook’s 1989 film, The Mahabharata which means \"The Political Story of the Human Race “was originally planned as a 9-hour version of the 18-volume Sanskrit text is based on his celebrated stage production. Mallika Sarabhai is a dancer/actor who plays Draupadi in Brook\'s film.
